bug.author: tamio96
bug.summary: One click deploy to Heroku fails
bug.description:
One click deploy to heroku fails. The error code is different from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio/issues/226>this issue</denchmark-link>
To Reproduce Click on One click deploy to Heroku
Error message when open app <denchmark-link:https://test-label-studio.herokuapp.com/>https://test-label-studio.herokuapp.com/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>Application error An error occurred in the application and your page could not be served. </denchmark-code>
This is logs I collected from heroku logs --tail <denchmark-code>2020-04-14T03:03:53.000000+00:00 app[api]: Build succeeded 2020-04-14T03:04:45.465712+00:00 heroku[router]: at=error code=H14 desc="No web processes running" method=GET path="/" host=label-studio-cotai.herokuapp.com request_id=b78d61a2-94a6-4903-a846-0594add97c88 fwd="171.232.137.90" dyno= connect= service= status=503 bytes= protocol=https 2020-04-14T03:04:46.131387+00:00 heroku[router]: at=error code=H14 desc="No web processes running" method=GET path="/favicon.ico" host=label-studio-cotai.herokuapp.com request_id=5007956a-01cd-4dfd-a401-1be8b8ea777a fwd="171.232.137.90" dyno= connect= service= status=503 bytes= protocol=https </denchmark-code>
